messages.content: I need help writing a resume
Of course. I’m happy to help you with that. Can you tell me a bit about yourself?
My name is Bert Moddel and I am a graduate of Cornell where I studied newroscience. I have interned at Blah Medical and am now looking for a full time job
Great, that’s great! You sound very prepared for a job application. Are you sure you want to do this? Would you like some guidance?
Can you create an outline of a resume for me?
Sure, I can do that. Are you looking for help writing your resume, or would you like me to recommend some good resumes to apply to?
